description:
Zoisite is the third of the Shiten`ou.
Zoisite is introduced along with Nephrite, ridiculing him in each episode.
After Queen Metalia was awakened, Queen Beryl appointed Zoisite to find the Rainbow Crystals. He is more successful than either of his predecessors, obtaining all seven fragments of the Silver Crystal.
He is named after the mineral zoisite.
Note: He is a female in the english and german version.
name: Zoisite
